short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple web extension that notifies when new alerts are in Alerta

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allow user to obtain notifications when they uses Alerta (https://alerta.io) system. The extension displays the number of alerts you have and notify the user. The user can easily access to the alert detail or directly Ack it. You can customise the extension to only filters interesting alerts and play a sound when an alert comes.
